title: Reciting Qur'an and giving it's reward to the dead - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: was asking about the ruling on reciting Quran and giving the flower giving the reward to the deceased so I recite surat yaseen i recite surah Tabarrok and i say o allah this is for my father for my uncle for my mother this is not permissible this is an innovation and it was not done by the Prophet Aries or some nor by his companions
